summary:
Mutilated, slaughtered and scorched!
New Dragon Bone Textures!
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][i][color=red][/color][/i][/b][i][*][b][color=red]/// 1.1 RELEASED ///[/color][/b]
[/i][/center][center][i][img]http://s1.directupload.net/images/130128/djz62xpj.jpg[/img][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/130130/v3pblxi9.jpg[/img][youtube]nWx9vYWHpAg[/youtube][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/130130/c9tzt4bn.jpg[/img][line][/i][/center][i]

[center][img]http://s14.directupload.net/images/130128/sf4her8u.jpg[/img][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/130128/r4dyh256.gif[/img][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/196727][img]http://s14.directupload.net/images/130128/6rpytgq2.gif[/img][/url][img]http://s1.directupload.net/images/130128/5in8k7j5.gif[/img][/center][line]
[center][b]other standalone retextures:[/b][/center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30331/][img]http://s1.directupload.net/images/130128/rkyqkt6a.gif[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28741/][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/130128/ifmd8avw.gif[/img][/url][line]


[img]http://s1.directupload.net/images/130128/bp9eelc2.jpg[/img]



[u]NEWS:[/u]
[*][b][color=red]/// 1.1 RELEASED ///[/color][/b]
[/i][list][i][/i][*][i][/i]You are now able to use different textures for DragonBones "slain by you" and other Dragonbones that are already placed in the environment. Read the Readme.txt for more info
[/list]Dragon Skeleton info:
old resolution:
[list][*][i]256x256[/i]
new resolutions:[*][i]1024x1024[/i]
[*][i]2048x2048[/i]
[*][i]4096x4096[/i]
[/list]


[b][u]UPDATES:[/u][/b]

v1.1:
[list][*]You kill a Dragon -> Bloody Dragon Bones
[*]The Dragonhead hanging above the Jarls throne in Whiterun -> Vanilla or other textures like "Enhanced HD Dragon Bones", "Eldergleam Dragon Bones"
[*]Bones placed in environments like on the road to Temple of Miraak -> Vanilla or other textures like "Enhanced HD Dragon Bones", "Eldergleam Dragon Bones"
[/list][b]-[i]PRO TIP: USE "Enhanced HD Dragon Bones - Opt NO Flesh" in conjunction with Bloody Dragon Bones[/i][/b]


v1.0:
[list][*]RELEASE
[/list]

[img]http://s14.directupload.net/images/130128/nyx53vkt.jpg[/img]

[b][u]HOW TO INSTALL:[/u][/b]
[i]Way 1[/i]: Simple NexusModManager installation without any menu ect.
[i]Way 2[/i]: Open the .rar file and extract the "Data" folder into your main Skyrim directory. (The one with the TESV.exe)

[b][u]HOW TO UNINSTALL:[/u][/b]
[i]Way 1[/i]: if installed with NMM use its deactivation function. Simple as that!
[i]Way 2[/i]: Go into your Data folder and remove the following files:
.../Data/Textures/actors/dragon/dragonskeleton1.dds
.../Data/Textures/actors/dragon/dragonskeleton1_n.dds
.../Data/Meshes/actors/dragon/character assets/underskin.nif


[b][u]Compatibility & additional INFO[/u][/b]

This Mod is compatible with ANYTHING Dragon related you might have installed.
I am not aware of ANY Mod that changes the skeleton of slain Dragons.


Just for your convenience:

[list][*]Enhanced HD Dragon Bones
[*]Eldergleam Dragon Bones
[*]Deadly Dragons
[*]Deadly Dragons Armory
[*]Bellyaches HD Dragon Replacer Pack
[*]Bellyaches New Dragon Species and Ohdaviing Replacer
[*]Dragon Combat Overhaul
[*]Dragons Diversified
[/list]
[b]ALL ARE 100% COMPATIBLE[/b]


[color=red]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/color]
If you like this mod, don't forget to support me =)
[color=red]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/color]


[center][color=orange]Permissions
You are not allowed to use any textures of this mod whithout my permission!
Do not upload or distribute these files on other sites![/color][/center]
author: Were

files.name: Bloody Dragon Bones 4k
files.changelogHtml:
You are now able to use different textures for DragonBones "slain by you" and other Dragonbones that are already placed in the environment
You can now use one of my other DragonBone textures seperately to increase the immersion
